__e: One of the ways the NSA was tracking bin Laden, or any terrorist for that matter, was to write code that would sift through millions of electronic communications looking for a needle in a giant haystack.
After a firefight, they killed Osama Bin Laden, and took custody of his body.
And I thought, "That's awesome," because we want Osama bin Laden, and now there's a link between these two people.
